title: The Quest: Journey to the Golden City
description: The fate of Aserobi is in Eli's hands.After a devastating attack on the village of Dorvale, Eli has spent three years helping his people pick up the pieces and restore their livelihoods. His father, Prince Christian, had promised the people of Dorvale that he would get revenge on the Zubarus for the attack. After three years of no news, Eli has gotten sick of waiting.Eli goes to his father’s camp for answers. His father throws him into a diplomatic mission to gain the favor of the Aserobians that he had lost long ago. In the company of his two best friends, Zuri and Iddah, Eli sets off on a journey to right his father’s wrongs and build an army.The three friends know they must earn the trust of the entire Aserobi, but a personal worry plagues them all, their missing best friend, Jeremiah. Eli knows he must focus on securing a powerful ally against the Zubaru, but he holds onto the hope that he will find Jeremiah alive somewhere along the way.Will Eli be able to accomplish what his father, the prince of Aserobi, has been unable to do?
author: Dorothy Mbori
